name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClipboardPaste - copy all urls to clipboard

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too many tabs opened? Need to save your tabs for later review? Identifying as a chronic tab hoarder? ClipboardPaste is a minimalâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too many tabs opened? Need to save your tabs for later review? Identifying as a chronic tab hoarder? ClipboardPaste is a minimal tool designed to quickly and effortlessly copy all URLs from your open tabs to your clipboard. With a single click, you can:

- Copy all URLs from the current window to the clipboard.
- Copy all tab titles from the current window to the clipboard.
- Close all tabs in the current window.
